text: dillee laut kar priya ne sabase pahale maan nirmala se phon par baat kee mammee veena deedee ne mujhase vaayada kiya hai ki vah is varsh disambar mein jarur aaengee aapase milane
aur koee nahin bhee aae chaahe dekh lena veena deedee jarur aaengee
priya bahut utsaahit thee
maan ne sunee usakee baat aur bolee chal betee too kahatee hai to maan letee hoon
vaise to har baar jab bhee usase baat hotee hai vah yahee kahatee hai
nirmala samajhatee thee ki veena apane man kee asalee baat to kisee se kahatee nahee hai
priya ko yah kaha hai to vaastav mein vah aaegee yah to samay hee bataega
yadi na kahatee to priya use baarabaar kahakar jidad karatee
baat ko kamasekam karane ka sabase saral upaay hai saamane vaale kee haanmenhaan mila dena
tum apanee kaho priya kaisa raha tumhaara trip nirmala ne aage baat badhaee
bahut achchha bahut hee achchha deedee ke paas rahane ke baad aur bhee maje aae
veena deedee jahaan rahatee hai vahaan to kuchh bhee nahee tha bas praakratik sundarata ke atirikt
aur amerika to bas kuchh na poochho hamaare lie to svarg samaan tha
laas ainjalas sanaphraansisko aur phir dijanee valdr
dijaneelaind mein rahe ham saat din aur vah saat din to bachcho ke saathasaath hamaare lie yaadagaar din hai
laasavigaas jaisa shahar to dekh kar man ko laga ham jaise ek aisee duniyaan mein rahate hai jahaan koee kaam nahee karata
jahaan sirph aanand lootate hai log
priya ke shabdo se hee maan nirmala ko andaaj ho gaya tha ki priya bahut khush hai
betee khush to maan kee khushee mein chaar chaand lag jaate hai
aise mein vah bolee chalo betee sab aaraam se sunege tumhaaree baaten
abhee to kuchh din aur hai bachchon ke skool khulane mein
tum deharaadoon aane ka jaldee se prograam bana lo

jarur aaenge

abhee to skool khulane mein poore pandrah din baaki hai

thaharo betee aavaaj lagaatee hoon
aajakal to kuchh sunate nahee aur sunate hai to man mein aae to javaab de dete hai
man mein aae to chup hee rahate hai
nirmala ne kaha
tab priya ne kaha aisa ho jaata hai maan is umr mein aap unase baat kiya karo
are betee aur kaun hai mere paas tumhaare daidee ke siva par mai bhee to saara din kaam mein jutee rahatee hoon
aur phir chalo chhodo le aa gae tumhaare daidee lo kar lo baat
nirmala ne phon shaayad pannaalaal ko de diya tha
priya ko doosaree taraph chuppee sunaee dee
bolee haillo haillo daideejee namaste lekin udhar se koee javaab nahin aaya
vah phir bolee hailo daidee aap sun rahe hai na namaste
utsaahit priyaane phir kaha
aavaaj savayan hee unchee ho gaee thee
phon theek tha use doosaree taraph nirmala kee dheemee aavaaj sunaee de rahee thee are priya hai aapakee betee
baat karo
priya sunakar chaunkee mammee shaayad kuchh chhupa rahee thee itane chustadurust daidee ko bhala yah kahane kee kya jarurat ki priya hai aapakee betee hai tabhee aavaaj aaee doosaree or se haillo
mai theek hoon aap kaisee ho main bilkul theek hoon
ek saath bol gae sab kuchh pannaalaal
are daidee aapakee aavaaj kuchh badalee lag rahee hai
kaise bol rahe hai aap priya dheeredheere bolakar jaise samajhana chaah rahee ho
aur udhar pannaalaal kee aavaaj phir aaee priya priya main theek hoon

ghabara gaee priya maan kuchh chhipa rahee hai
socha usane
phon par daidee to rat lagae the main theek hoon
sab theek hai
kuchh der baad mammee ne phon svayan le liya
tujhe kaha tha na ki betee aajakal apaneehee dhun mein rahate hai
nirmala to jaise naarmal thee
aisa kaise lag raha hai aapako mammee daidee to bilkul naarmal nahee hai
dedh maheene mein itana phark aa gaya hai
chekap karavaaya hai kya priya ghabara rahee thee
are betee daaktar ko to kal bhee dikhaakar aae hai
vah to kah raha hai bilkul naarmal hai

ab too khud samajh daidee tere pichaasee varsh ke ho chale hai

haan theek hai lekin do maheene pahale ke daidee kee aavaaj mein aur aaj kee aavaaj mein to bahut antar hai
aap mujhase kuchh chhipa rahee hai
main abhee aa rahee hoon dillee se aapake paas
priya ko laga jaise mammee ekadam use kuchh bataana nahee chaah rahee
are betee aisa mat soch too aaegee na agale saptaah svayan dekh lena
abhee itane din baahar lagaakar aaee hai
aur saphar ki thakaavat hai ghar kee bhee saphaee hai
aaraam se aa jaana
nirmala ke baat ke lahaje se lagane laga priya ko ki jarur kuchh hua hai

usane bhee koee aisee baat nahee bataee
daidee ka haal to usane bhee poochha tha
usane bhee yahee kaha tha sab theek hai
vah to priya se kuchh nahee chhipaatee
phir kyon use abhee sab atapata lag raha hai
pannaalaal apane man mein hee khoe rahate hai
apanee hee duniyaan mein leen
bachapan se hee dekha tha bachchon ne vah subah paanch baje uth jaate the aur saat baje unakee pooja shuru ho jaatee thee
pahale pahal yah pooja aadha ghanta letee thee aur umr badhane ke saathasaath pooja ka samay har varsh ke saath paanch minat badhata chala gaya
ritaayarament ke baad to kam se kam do ghante kee yah niyamit dinacharya ban gayee thee unakee
betiyon kee shaadee ho jaane ke baad to jaise pannaalaal ka jeevan ghar ke mandir mein hee beetane laga tha
jab samay mila bas vaheen usee kone mein apane ganesh jee kee moorat ke paas ja baithate the
vahee unake priy sakha the
kabheekabhee nirmala ko bahut gussa aa jaata tha
khaane ke samay mein khaane kee sudh nahin aur ja kar poojaaghar mein gaayatree mantr ka jaap kie ja rahe hai
har vyakit ke jeevan mein badalaav aata hai
kuchh paristhitiyaan karava detee hai kuchh svayan karane ka man karata hai
aur kuchh vakt ke saathasaath vyakit ka svabhaav naene rup dhaaran karata rahata hai

kaaphee antaraal ke baad mile doosare ko isaka aabhaas turant ho jaata hai
priya ne to abhee baat hee kee thee
use to ekaek laga ki daidee kee tabeeyat kuchh gadabad hai
mammee chhipa rahee hai ya phir unhen isaka itana aabhaas nahin hua
geeta se bhee dubaara baat huee usane to yahee kaha ki daidee to apanee dhun mein rahate hai

ab dhyaan doongee
lekin priya ko to chain nahin tha
vah to aur kuchh soch hee nahin pa rahee thee
usane amit ko baat bataee aur agale hee din ve chaarapaanch dinon ke lie deharaadoon ja pahunche
priya apane daidee pannaalaal ke sammukh baith kar unhen nihaar rahee thee
bahut pyaar aa raha tha use unake chehare par chhaee maasoomiyat ko dekhakar
vah chup baithe hue kaheen aur khoe hue the

ek minat kee deree bhee nahee sahan karate the

ab unhen khaane ke lie jab bolo vah chupachaap khaane kee tebal par aakar baith jaate the

na khaana khaane ko aur na hee khaana bas karane ko
aap unakee plet mein daalatee ja rahee ho rotee aur vah khae ja rahe hai
unakee khuraak to kabhee itanee nahin thee
teen rotee se adhik to kabhee khaate nahee the

aise mein samay beetata raha aur pannaalaal kee chup rahane kee aadat mein poojaapaath kee vyastata mein ghar mein baagavaanee karate rahane ke shauk mein aur shaam ko teleevijan par khabaren sunane ke niyam mein kab parivartan aaya isakee khabar kisee ko nahee lagee

lekin chuppee kee aadat mein shikaayat na karane kee niyam mein kab parivartan aaya kisee ko khabar nahee lagee

aise mein daidee ke bachapan ke raub mein kab unake daidee mein parivartan aa gaya betiyon ko bhee pata nahin laga
vaastav mein is ghar mein pannaalaal kee upasthiti kee khabar sabhee ko thee par yah ghar vaastav mein betiyon kee baaton aur maan ke vaartaalaap se hee aabaad rahata tha

vah to is parivaar kee bhaavanaon se pare hai
use jaise koee chinta nahin
vah ek boodhe aadamee se jyaada mahatv nahee de raha tha pannaalaal ko
lekin veena vah to usee boodhe aadamee kee betee hai
use to khabar honee chaahie
khabar sunakar chinta bhee honee chaahie
aur chintit hai yadi to use apane pita se milaneaana chaahie aisa hee kuchh sochate hue usakee kalam chal uthee aur usane angrejee mein chand shabd likh die jo ek kavita ke rup me dhal gae the
amit ne padha unako
priya ko dikhaaya
padhakar usakee aankhon mein aansoo bhar aae
amit ne yoon likha tha
tumhaare pita ab theek nahin hain
saaree yaaden unakee kho gaee hain
bas tum hee yaad aatee ho
vah kuchh nahin karate
bas tumhen yaad karate hai
na shabd koee shesh bache hai
na bhaavanaen koee vyakt karane ko
bas tumhen yaad karate hain
chhiyaasee varsh ke ho chale hai
par ab vyakt bhaav hai
chhah varsh ke baalak se
tumhen pukaarate hai
tumhen chaahate hai
saara parivaar paas hai
tumhaaree kamee khalatee hai
solah varsh bahut lambe hote hai
raaja raam ko vanavaas mila tha
chaudah varsh ka
tumhaare to beet chale hai solah varsh
tumhen to kisee ne vanavaas nahee diya
tab yah kyon tadap rahe hai
tum gaee thee
ek dulhan kee bhaanti
ek aagyaakaaree putree kee bhaanti
ab tum badee ho chukee ho
tumhaare bhee ek beta hai
aur sundar betiyaan
vah to khaalee man se hain
bachchon kee tarah khelate hai
kabheekabhee dhoondhate hain
apanee bitiya ko
pyaareesee gudiya ko
pyaareesee bitiya ko
vah tumhen shaayad na pahachaan paen
vah tumhaara svaagat shaayad na kar paen
par tumhaaree jarurat hai unhen
vah tumhen milane ko betaab hai
aao unhen mil jao
apan chehara dikha jao
tabhee shaayad vah shaanti se apanee
yaatra pooree kar saken
mujhe nahee lagata priya ki veena deedee itanee jaldee aaengee
amit ne phir apanee soch se avagat karaaya priya ko
aisa main nahin maanatee
deedee ab jarur aaengee
daidee kee dasha ko samajhegee to dekhana vah jarur aaengee
priya ke vishvaas ko dekhakar amit ne bhee tab yahee kaha chalo tumhaaree soch hee theek ho shaayad
achchha hee hoga yadi vah aa jaen
baat yaheen samaapt ho gaee
ve phir apaneapane kaam mein vyast ho gae
